scripts.clean: concurrently --kill-others "cd server && npm run clean" "cd client && npm run clean"
scripts.lint: concurrently --kill-others "cd server && npm run lint" "cd client && npm run lint"
scripts.lint:fix: concurrently --kill-others "cd server && npm run lint:fix" "cd client && npm run lint:fix"
scripts.format:prettier: concurrently --kill-others "cd server && npm run format:prettier" "cd client && npm run format:prettier"
scripts.test: concurrently --kill-others "cd server && npm run test" "cd client && npm run test"
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.start:prod: concurrently --kill-others "cd server && npm run start:prod" "cd client && npm run start:prod"
scripts.build: concurrently --kill-others "cd server && npm run build" "cd client && npm run build"
scripts.script: concurrently --kill-others "cd server && npm run $SCRIPT" "cd client && npm run $SCRIPT"
